price: Bosome nso Yɛahyehyε soε berε ama no kͻpem sε εbεsan ayε sε akyiresua papa dadaa a awoͻ na akoa.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
